modeSystem.label: Mode System
modeSystem.description: Choose between Caret or Cline mode.

messages.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to continue?
messages.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This action cannot be undone.
messages.confirmResetGlobal: Do you also want to reset global settings?

apiConfiguration.title: API Configuration
apiConfiguration.description: Configure API settings for connecting to AI models.

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Configure Caret's basic behavior and language settings.

features.title: Feature Settings
features.description: Enable or disable various Caret features.

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.description: Configure web search and browser-related features.

terminal.title: Terminal Settings
terminal.description: Configure terminal integration and command execution settings.

about.title: About Caret
about.description: View version information and license for Caret.

tooltips.resetSettings: Reset all settings to default values

browser.remoteBrowserDescription: Using a remote browser connection allows you to run a separate Chrome instance. You can specify a custom path below. Using a remote browser connection requires starting Chrome in debug mode.
browser.debugModeDescription: manually (--remote-debugging-port=9222) or using the button below. Enter the host

terminal.defaultProfileDescription: Select the default terminal Caret will use. 'Default' uses your VSCode global setting.
terminal.shellTimeoutDescription: Set how long Caret waits for shell integration to activate before executing commands. Increase this value if you experience terminal connection timeouts.
terminal.aggressiveReuseDescription: When enabled, Caret will reuse existing terminal windows that aren't in the current working directory. Disable this if you experience issues with task lockout after a terminal command.
terminal.outputLimitDescription: Maximum number of lines to include in terminal output when executing commands. When exceeded, lines will be removed from the middle, saving tokens.

features.enableCheckpointsDescription: Enables extension to save checkpoints of workspace throughout the task. Uses git under the hood which may not work well with large workspaces.
features.enableMcpMarketplaceDescription: Enables the MCP Marketplace tab for discovering and installing MCP servers.
features.enableRichMcpDisplayDescription: Enables rich formatting for MCP responses. When disabled, responses will be shown in plain text.
features.collapseMcpResponsesDescription: Sets the default display mode for MCP response panels
features.openaiReasoningEffortDescription: Reasoning effort for the OpenAI family of models (applies to all OpenAI model providers)

autoApprove.title: Auto Approve Settings
autoApprove.tooltip: Configure auto-approval settings for various actions
autoApprove.label: Auto Approve
autoApprove.maxRequestsTooltip: Maximum number of consecutive requests that can be auto-approved

enableAutoApprove.label: Enable auto-approve
enableAutoApprove.description: Toggle the auto-approve feature on or off.

enableAll.label: Toggle all
enableAll.description: Toggle all actions on or off.

readFiles.label: Read project files
readFiles.description: Allows Cline to read files within your workspace.

readFilesExternally.label: Read all files
readFilesExternally.description: Allows Cline to read any file on your computer.

editFiles.label: Edit project files
editFiles.description: Allows Cline to modify files within your workspace.

editFilesExternally.label: Edit all files
editFilesExternally.description: Allows Cline to modify any file on your computer.

executeSafeCommands.label: Execute safe commands
executeSafeCommands.description: Allows Cline to execute safe terminal commands. If the model determines a command is potentially destructive, it will still require approval.

executeAllCommands.label: Execute all commands
executeAllCommands.description: Allows Cline to execute all terminal commands. Use at your own risk.

useBrowser.label: Use the browser
useBrowser.description: Allows Cline to launch and interact with any website in a browser.

useMcp.label: Use MCP servers
useMcp.description: Allows Cline to use configured MCP servers which may modify filesystem or interact with APIs.

enableNotifications.label: Enable notifications
enableNotifications.description: Receive system notifications when Cline requires approval to proceed or when a task is completed.

telemetry.label: Allow anonymous error and usage reporting
telemetry.description: Help improve Cline by sending anonymous usage data and error reports. No code, prompts, or personal information are ever sent. See our

debug.resetGlobalStateDescription: This will reset all global state and secret storage in the extension.

about.feedbackPrompt: If you have any questions or feedback, you're always welcome.
about.title: About
about.description: Check Caret version and related information.

modelPicker.extensionFetches: The extension automatically fetches the latest list of models available on
modelPicker.unsureWhichModel: If you're unsure which model to choose, Caret works best with
modelPicker.freeOptions: You can also try searching "free" for no-cost options currently available.
